person.persName: Joseph H Arvin (Taylor County, Kentucky, student and soldier)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, student and soldier. Son of Edward H. Arvin and Susanna Arvin. Married to Mary E. Arvin. Resident of Taylor County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attended school in Taylor County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and a corporal from December 30, 1861 to January 12, 1865. Wounded in battle in Tennessee in November 1863.
